title: Amelia Earhart, Sasquatch, Atlantis, T-shirt Contest Results
content: What ever happened to those T-shirt contest results? I heard rumors they were last seen under the hairy manimal arm of Sasquatch while he hopped aboard Amelia Earhart
author: dogg

comments.content: The judges folder doesn't look like it's been looked at since Sept. 1st . . .
